Row.Text: The Imperial Guard is the Napoleonic replacement for the Line Infantry. Unlike the regular Line Infantry, the Imperial Guard is stronger, though it also takes longer to build. It increases the amount of points generated toward Great Generals from combat. It also begins with additional XP if trained in a city with a Courthouse.
Our people are now demanding that their civil liberties be held and their merits honoured. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Compile the Code Civil de Francais

Now that we have asserted over dominance over France, it is time to overturn its outdated law codes. No man should be privileged by birth. No man should be prohibited from practicing what religion he wills. Turncoat Diplomat

Our minister of Foreign Affairs, Charles-Maurice de Talleyrand, has traded in his loyalties to us for a lofty title in the court of {1_LeaderName}. This is perhaps for the best, as Talleyrand is a well-known snake, with a personality as pleasant as manure in silk stockings. But this does mean we must choose a new Minister.[NEWLINE]
